QuestData.Title: No Time to Talk
QuestData.Description: Dargrul has sent his pets to do battle with us.$b$bWe need to crush these elementals before their rage swarms into Thunder Totem.
QuestData.CompletionText: We will all be honorary masons if this keeps up much longer.
QuestData.RewardText: It has been a long time since the earth itself has moved against us like this.
